languages.text: "Меня не оставляет ощущение, что проктор был не дарован в качестве телохранителя, а приставлен как соглядатай арбитров".

traits.locale_text: "Меня не оставляет ощущение, что проктор был не дарован в качестве телохранителя, а приставлен как соглядатай арбитров".

languages.text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."
languages.original_text: "Меня не оставляет ощущение, что проктор был не дарован в качестве телохранителя, а приставлен как соглядатай арбитров".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."
"I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."
"I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."
"I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."
"I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."
"I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."

languages.text: 「どうしても疑惑が拭えないんだ。あの代理人は護衛として与えられたのではなく、アービトレイターの内通者として送り込まれたのではないかと」
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしても疑惑が拭えないんだ。あの代理人は護衛として与えられたのではなく、アービトレイターの内通者として送り込まれたのではないかと」

languages.text: "Ich werde das Gefühl nicht los, dass der Proktor uns nicht als Leibwächter geschickt wurde, sondern als Spion der Arbitratoren."
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde das Gefühl nicht los, dass der Proktor uns nicht als Leibwächter geschickt wurde, sondern als Spion der Arbitratoren."

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas m'empêcher de penser que le proctor n'a pas été envoyé ici pour jouer les gardes du corps, mais plutôt pour servir d'agent infiltré aux arbitrators. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas m'empêcher de penser que le proctor n'a pas été envoyé ici pour jouer les gardes du corps, mais plutôt pour servir d'agent infiltré aux arbitrators. »

languages.text: «No puedo evitar pensar que nos han endilgado al Procurador no como guardaespaldas, sino como agente infiltrado del Arbites».
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo evitar pensar que nos han endilgado al Procurador no como guardaespaldas, sino como agente infiltrado del Arbites».

languages.text: “我有种感觉，这位派到我们身边的监察官并不是保镖，而是法务部安插进来的特工。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."

traits.locale_text: “我有种感觉，这位派到我们身边的监察官并不是保镖，而是法务部安插进来的特工。”

languages.text: "Üsteğmen'in koruma değil de Yargıcılara çalışan bir casus olduğu için aramıza katıldığını düşünmeden edemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the feeling that the Proctor was given to us not to act as a bodyguard, but rather to serve as the Arbitrators' inside agent."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen'in koruma değil de Yargıcılara çalışan bir casus olduğu için aramıza katıldığını düşünmeden edemiyorum."
